    • cookieName

      public static Criteria<org.openqa.selenium.Cookie> cookieName(String name)
      The checking of a browser cookie.
      Parameters:
      name - is a cookie name
      Returns:
      criteria that checks/filters a browser cookie
      See Also:
      • Cookie.getName()

    • cookieNameMatches

      public static Criteria<org.openqa.selenium.Cookie> cookieNameMatches(String expression)
      The checking of a browser cookie.
      Parameters:
      expression - is a substring of text that a cookie name is supposed to have. It is possible to pass reg exp pattern that name of a cookie should fit.
      Returns:
      criteria that checks/filters a browser cookie
      See Also:
      • Cookie.getName()

      Parameters:

    • cookieIsSecure

      public static Criteria<org.openqa.selenium.Cookie> cookieIsSecure()
      The checking of a browser cookie. It is used to filter secure cookies. The sample below shows how to make inverted criteria

      NOT(cookieIsSecure())

      Returns:
      criteria that checks/filters a browser cookie
      See Also:
      • Cookie.isSecure()
      • Criteria.NOT(Criteria[])

    • cookieIsHttpOnly

      public static Criteria<org.openqa.selenium.Cookie> cookieIsHttpOnly()
      The checking of a browser cookie. It is used to filter http-only cookies. The sample below shows how to make inverted criteria

      NOT(cookieIsHttpOnly())

      Returns:
      criteria that checks/filters a browser cookie
      See Also:
      • Cookie.isHttpOnly()
      • Criteria.NOT(Criteria[])

    • cookieExpiry

      public static Criteria<org.openqa.selenium.Cookie> cookieExpiry(Date dateExpiry)
      The checking of a browser cookie. It is used to filter cookies by expiry date.
      Parameters:
      dateExpiry - is expected expiry date
      Returns:
      criteria that checks/filters a browser cookie
      See Also:
      • Cookie.getExpiry()

    • cookieExpiryBefore

      public static Criteria<org.openqa.selenium.Cookie> cookieExpiryBefore(Date before)
      The checking of a browser cookie. It is used to filter cookies by expiry date.
      Parameters:
      before - is upper border of a cookie expiry date
      Returns:
      criteria that checks/filters a browser cookie
      See Also:
      • Cookie.getExpiry()

    • cookieExpiryAfter

      public static Criteria<org.openqa.selenium.Cookie> cookieExpiryAfter(Date after)
      The checking of a browser cookie. It is used to filter cookies by expiry date.
      Parameters:
      after - is lower border of a cookie expiry date
      Returns:
      criteria that checks/filters a browser cookie
